SELECT ub.id, ub.username, ub.phone, ub.email, ub.role, ub.status, ub.create_time, ui.gender, ui.height, ui.weight, ui.goal, ui.level, ui.bio, ui.avatar_url FROM user_base ub LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ub.id = ui.user_id
AND ( username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
AND ub.role = 'user'
ORDER BY id DESC
